title: Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles, Bath Dual-Sided Long Handle Back Scrubber Body Exfoliator for Wet or Dry Brushing
descriptions:
Indulge in the ultimate shower experience with the Metene Shower Brush! This dual-sided brush features soft nylon bristles to gently clean and effectively wash your skin, as well as stiff natural bristles to exfoliate and reveal your smoothest skin ever. Whether you prefer wet or dry brushing, this brush has got you covered.

The 17-inch wooden handle is designed for maximum reach, with anti-slip rubber patches and a hanging rope for easy storage. With a recommended replacement period of every 3-6 months and a washing frequency of every few weeks, this brush is built to last.

Upgrade your shower routine with the Metene Shower Brush and say hello to softer, smoother skin every day!

The 17-inch wooden handle is equipped with non-slip rubber patches and a hanging rope for easy storage. Maintain your skin's health by replacing the brush every 3-6 months and cleaning it every few weeks. Elevate your self-care routine with the Metene Shower Brush - your skin will thank you!
